subsections.title: This’ll  be  a   Section  About  the  Greek  Letter  Θ!
content: A  heading  containing  characters  not  allowed  in  fragments,  UTF-8  characters,  two  consecutive  spaces  between  the  first  and  second  words,  and  formatting.
